name: GoatPunks
description: GoatPunks is a rip-roaring king of the hill multiplayer game of goats, mountains, fireballs and good ole head-butting action. Can you hoof it to the top and stay there?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Atom x5 Z8300 / 1.44 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Tested on Intel Compute Stick STK2M3W64CC (Requires x64 Version of GoatPunks), STK1AW32SC (Requires x86 Version of GoatPunks)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6770HQ / 2.60 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics 580 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Tested on Intel Skull Canyon NUC
